resources.string: Use onboard or remote resources for processing collected samples
Remote Processor Hostname or IP Address
For remote processing, enter the fully qualified hostname, or IP address, of the base station that can be reached by your TPMS readers, and that can access the internet.
Seconds of Data Collected Per Sample
Enter the number of seconds of data collected and forwarded to the base station for processing.
Check this box to generate additional feedback for debugging the application
The current version and recent feature-level changes of this app.
Legal attributes and license information pertinent to this app.
Options related to the automatic generation of crash reports.
Reduce SDR gain and restart signal collection if signal appears to be exceeding measurable dynamic range.
